attributes.action: Reverse  pension index policy for commonweath expats.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To index NI pensions to commonwealth expats as is done for non commonwealth countries.
Canadian NI pensions to expats are not indexed while NI pensions to USA expats are indexed.
This policy is discriminatory and grossly
unfair. Who do you call when you need help? Commonwealth countries first!
